resources.string: The main menu of the app where the user can choose \"where to go\" by clicking on any item in the menu.
This activity presents a list of albums. If you\'ll click on the album then activity with a list of songs from this album will appear. \nRight now, only first four CardViews have OnClickListeners!
This activity presents a list of artists. If you\'ll click on the album then activity with a list of songs of this artist will appear. \nRight now, only first four CardViews have OnClickListeners!

This activity presents a list of songs (from selected album, artist or the whole library). If you\'ll click on the song then activity with a selected song as a currently playing will appear. \nRight now, only first three CardViews have OnClickListeners!

To see this toast message once again press "Previous" button! 
This activity presents a currently playing song. 
It's partially implemented. You can play and pause a sample song. 
It'll be stopped when you will leave this activity. 
The album cover is also set as a background image.
